content.title: Other court cases related to your marriage, property or children
content.courtNeedsToKnow: The court needs to know if there are, or have ever been, any other legal proceedings related to your marriage, property or children.
content.onGoingProceedings: This includes any proceedings that are still ongoing, have finished or which have been abandoned.
content.includeProceedings: Include proceedings that are between you and your {{ divorceWho }}, and between yourselves and third parties.
content.question: Have you ever been involved in any court cases relating to your marriage, property or children?
content.stillOngoing: if they’re still ongoing or if they’ve finished
content.courtNames: name of the court and the country it’s in
content.datesBegan: dates that the proceedings began and of any future hearings
content.orderDetails: details of any orders that were made
content.proceedingsRelated: The proceedings are related to our:

checkYourAnswersContent.question: Other court cases?
checkYourAnswersContent.proceedingsRelated: There have been other court cases related to our

legalProceedings.required: Select yes if there are other legal proceedings
legalProceedings.invalid: Select yes if there are other legal proceedings

legalProceedingsRelated.required: Select what the proceedings relate to, e.g. the marriage
legalProceedingsRelated.invalid: Select what the proceedings relate to, e.g. the marriage

legalProceedingsDetails.required: Enter the details of the proceedings
legalProceedingsDetails.invalid: Enter the details of the proceedings

content.title: Achosion llys eraill sy’n ymwneud â’ch priodas, eich eiddo neu eich plant
content.courtNeedsToKnow: Mae’r llys angen gwybod a oes, neu a fu erioed, unrhyw achosion cyfreithiol eraill yn ymwneud â’ch priodas, eich eiddo neu eich plant.
content.onGoingProceedings: Mae hyn yn cynnwys unrhyw achosion sy’n dal i fynd ymlaen, achosion sydd wedi gorffen neu achosion y rhoddwyd y gorau iddynt.
content.includeProceedings: Dylech gynnwys achosion sydd rhyngoch chi a’ch {{ divorceWho }}, ac achosion rhyngoch chi eich dau a thrydydd parti.
content.question: Ydych chi erioed wedi bod yn rhan o unrhyw achos llys sy’n ymwneud â’ch priodas, eich eiddo neu eich plant?
content.stillOngoing: a yw’r achos yn dal i fynd ymlaen neu a yw wedi gorffen
content.namesInvolved: enwau’r rhai oedd yn rhan o’r achos
content.courtNames: enw’r llys a’r wlad lle cynhelir yr achos
content.datesBegan: dyddiad cychwyn yr achos a dyddiad unrhyw wrandawiad yn y dyfodol

checkYourAnswersContent.question: Achosion llys eraill?
checkYourAnswersContent.proceedingsRelated: Bu achosion llys eraill ynglyn â’n

legalProceedings.required: Dewiswch do os oes achos llys arall
legalProceedings.invalid: Dewiswch do os oes achos llys arall

legalProceedingsRelated.required: Ynglyn â beth mae’r achos, y briodas, er enghraifft
legalProceedingsRelated.invalid: Ynglyn â beth mae’r achos, y briodas, er enghraifft
